Symbol.Script_3D:
IF gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 THEN !!ROUND profile!! if gs_gutter_type=0 then PUT -DD-dshw, DD, gs_mask-64, -DD-pt, DD, gs_mask-64, -DD-pt, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), gs_mask, 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900, 0, 180, 4000+gs_mask, DD+pt, DD, gs_mask-64, DD+dshw, DD, gs_mask-64, DD+dshw, DD-sth, gs_mask-64, DD+sth, DD-sth, gs_mask-64, DD+sth, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), gs_mask, 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900, 0, -180, 4000+gs_mask, -DD-sth, DD-sth, gs_mask-64, -DD-dshw, DD-sth, gs_mask-64 endif
if gs_gutter_type=1 then
PUT 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900 PUT DD, 360, 4000+gs_mask PUT DD+sth, 360, 4000+gs_mask
! PUT -DD-dshw, DD, gs_mask-64, ! -DD-pt, DD, gs_mask-64, ! -DD-pt, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), gs_mask, ! 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900, ! 0, 180, 4000+gs_mask, ! DD+pt, DD, gs_mask-64, ! DD+dshw, DD, gs_mask-64, ! DD+dshw, DD-sth, gs_mask-64, ! DD+sth, DD-sth, gs_mask-64, ! DD+sth, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), gs_mask, ! 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900, ! 0, -180, 4000+gs_mask, ! -DD-sth, DD-sth, gs_mask-64, ! -DD-dshw, DD-sth, gs_mask-64 endif
ENDIF IF gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=2 THEN !!RECTANGULAR profile!! PUT -AA-dshw, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, -BB-pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, AA+pt, -BB-pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, AA+pt, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB-sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, BB-sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, -BB-sth - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, -AA-sth, -BB-sth - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, -AA-sth, BB-sth, gs_mask, -AA-dshw, BB-sth, gs_mask ENDIF IF gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=3 THEN !!CORRUGATED profile!! PUT -AA-dshw, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, -BB+r-pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, 0, -1, 800, -AA+r, -BB-pt - (dis_wall - BB), 1000+gs_mask, AA-r, -BB-pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, 1, 0, 800, AA+pt, -BB+r-pt - (dis_wall - BB), 1000+gs_mask, AA+pt, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB-sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, BB-sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, -BB-sth+r - (dis_wall - BB),gs_mask, 0, -1, 800, AA+sth-r, -BB-sth - (dis_wall - BB), 1000+gs_mask, -AA-sth+r, -BB-sth - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, -1, 0, 800, -AA-sth, -BB-sth+r - (dis_wall - BB),1000+gs_mask, -AA-sth, BB-sth, gs_mask, -AA-dshw, BB-sth, gs_mask ENDIF
Symbol.Script_2D:
IF gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=1 THEN !!ROUND profile!! if gs_gutter_type=0 then PUT -DD-dshw, DD, gs_mask, -DD-pt, DD, gs_mask, -DD-pt, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), gs_mask, 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900, 0, 180, 4000+gs_mask, DD+pt, DD, gs_mask, DD+dshw, DD, gs_mask, DD+dshw, DD-sth, gs_mask, DD+sth, DD-sth, gs_mask, DD+sth, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), gs_mask, 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900, 0, -180, 4000+gs_mask, -DD-sth, DD-sth, gs_mask, -DD-dshw, DD-sth, gs_mask endif
if gs_gutter_type=1 then PUT 0, 0 - (dis_wall - DD), 900 PUT DD, 360, 4000+gs_mask PUT DD+sth, 360, 4000+gs_mask endif
ENDIF IF gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=2 THEN !!RECTANGULAR profile!! PUT -AA-dshw, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, -BB - pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, AA+pt, -BB - pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, AA+pt, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB - sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, BB - sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, -BB - sth - (dis_wall - BB),gs_mask, -AA-sth, -BB - sth - (dis_wall - BB),gs_mask, -AA-sth, BB - sth, gs_mask, -AA-dshw, BB - sth, gs_mask ENDIF IF gs_gutter_ds_profile_num=3 THEN !!CORRUGATED profile!! PUT -AA-dshw, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, BB, gs_mask, -AA-pt, -BB + r - pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, 0, -1, 800, -AA+r-pt, -BB - pt - (dis_wall - BB), 1000+gs_mask, AA-r+pt, -BB - pt - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, 1, 0, 800, AA+pt, -BB + r - pt - (dis_wall - BB), 1000+gs_mask, AA+pt, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB, gs_mask, AA+dshw, BB - sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, BB - sth, gs_mask, AA+sth, -BB - sth + r - (dis_wall - BB),gs_mask, 0, -1, 800, AA+sth-r, -BB - sth - (dis_wall - BB), 1000+gs_mask, -AA-sth+r, -BB - sth - (dis_wall - BB), gs_mask, -1, 0, 800, -AA-sth, -BB - sth + r - (dis_wall - BB),1000+gs_mask, -AA-sth, BB - sth, gs_mask, -AA-dshw, BB - sth, gs_mask ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS=0.0000001 !!precision of zero!! st=0.001 !!slab thickness!! sth=0.002 !!hanger thickness!! sthw=0.03 !!hanger width!! sthh=0.2 !!hanger long!! r=0.01 !!Corrugated downspout corrugating-radius!! pt=0.0002 !!plane thickness!!
!!downspout hanger +width!! if gs_gutter_type=0 then dshw=0.04 endif if gs_gutter_type=1 then dshw=0.01 endif
AA=gs_gutter_aa BB=gs_gutter_bb DD=gs_gutter_dd
